Articles.Content:
This is a picture I scanned from this months National Geographic, but it had little information on it.

It is described as a NASA space suit simulator. Does anyone know its offical name or have links to more information?

Thanks
It's a prop from the upcoming "Robot Monster 2: This time we got the whole suit!"

It is a prototype of the Z1 space suit. They are using it to run some features tests of the new space suits. Here is an article that will tell you much more than I can: http://www.makepartsfast.com/2013/08/5982/the-do-everything-space-suit/
